message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You got lucky last round, now it's my turn to get a better deal!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
You're getting desperate, I can sense it! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting the best of me!
I'm not desperate yet, but I'm willing to make a slightly better offer. Take it or leave it!
